li.Not open to Information Technology major: Not open to Information Technology majors, Computer Science majors or Computer Engineering majors.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Admission Requirements
Not open to Information Technology majors, Computer Science majors or Computer Engineering majors.
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0: COP3223C - Introduction to Programming with C (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 3 credits from the following types of courses: 
any one (1) additional course taught by CS/IT at UCF that counts toward the IT major. Requisites must be met to access elective courses.

p.Not open to Information Technology major: Not open to Information Technology majors, Computer Science majors, or Computer Engineering majors.
p.A minimum grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better: A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
p.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned within the Computer Science or Information Technology program at UCF.
p.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
p.Internship, cooperative education, or In: Internship, cooperative education, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
p.The courses used to satisfy the college: The courses used to satisfy the college electives for this minor cannot also be used to satisfy the requirements for a Computer Science Minor.

li.Not open to Information Technology major: Not open to Information Technology majors, Computer Science majors, or Computer Engineering majors.
li.A minimum grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better: A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned within the Computer Science or Information Technology program at UCF.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, cooperative education, or In: Internship, cooperative education, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
li.The courses used to satisfy the college: The courses used to satisfy the college electives for this minor cannot also be used to satisfy the requirements for a Computer Science Minor.

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements
  Not open to Information Technology majors, Computer Science majors, or Computer Engineering majors.
A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned within the Computer Science or Information Technology program at UCF.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, cooperative education, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
The courses used to satisfy the college electives for this minor cannot also be used to satisfy the requirements for a Computer Science Minor.
